questions.question: What is the predominant color of the headset's earcups and headband?
What color is the accent trim along the headband and earcups?
What appears to be the primary material of the earcups?
Does the headset have a visible microphone boom?
What is the overall shape of the earcups?
Describe the texture of the earcups' outer surface.
Are there any visible perforations or grills on the earcups?
What kind of connection is visible at the end of the headset's cable?
What is the apparent design style of the headset?
Considering the headband and earcups, does the headset seem over-ear or on-ear?
Is the headband design padded or unpadded?
What material seems to constitute the headset's headband?
Describe the overall appearance of the microphone boom.
Are there any visible logos or branding on the headset?
Based on the visual, does the headset look lightweight or heavy?
